entry.title: Friday: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 19.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness late this morning. Ice fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 37 this morning and minus 26 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 07:25 AM CST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 26 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 07:25 AM CST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 10.
